tool.name: Subsection of Genbank File
tool.description: take a Genbank file and produce a subsection retaining features
tool.command:
subsection.py --galaxy --outfile_supporting $__new_file_path__ --file "${file}"
#if $start and $start is not "None": --start "${start}" #end if
#if $end and $end is not "None": --end "${end}" #end if
--subsection "${subsection}"
--subsection_files_path "${subsection.files_path}"
--subsection_format "${subsection_format}"
--subsection_id "${subsection.id}"
tool.help:
Genome subsectio Tool =====================
Take a subsection of a genbank file, useful for extracting regions of interest for downstream analysis
